settings.notice: This plugin provides AI Provider integrations for other plugins. Configure your providers below.
settings.providerNameDesc: Enter a name for this provider
settings.providerTypeDesc: Select the type of AI provider
settings.defaultModelDesc: Select the default AI model for this provider
settings.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete provider "{{name}}"?
settings.modelDesc:
Select the AI model for this provider.
Or switch to text mode
settings.modelTextDesc:
Enter the AI model name.
Or switch to dropdown mode
settings.modelTextOnlyDesc: Enter the AI model name for this provider.
settings.developerSettingsDesc: Enable additional settings for development and debugging
settings.useNativeFetchDesc: Use native Fetch API instead of electron-specific implementation (may help with CORS issues)

errors.pluginMustBeUpdatedFormatted: Plugin must be updated to work with this version of AI Providers
